entry.title: 破解软件-音乐类整合
entry.content:
​ 人人都向往美好，可以很容易接受美好的欺骗，却难以接受不友好的真相。可是人生岂是只有美好，只有直面真相学会接受，并努力改变自己，我们才能真正的热爱生活。

电脑：

1.酷我：绿色免安装版（内附教程）：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/iwqGAed5qyh

​ 官网版补丁：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/i8lxg4h

2.网易云：官网版补丁：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/iabH0ed5t5g

3.网易云+qq：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/iJjWOed5ykb （自己琢磨吧，不多说）

手机：

1.酷我：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/iMITHed6dzg

2.网易云：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/iQ73Ued6fdg （个人没用过，你们自己试试吧）

3.全网：https://zyx0315.lanzous.com/iXS0sed6n5g （支持导入网易云、qq歌单，占内存极小，不支持批量）

还有几款操作比较复杂的，没放上来，要的下面评论吧。

​

entry.title: 盗将行***
entry.content:
你之所以会觉得难受，大概是因为你投入了大把时间和精力，到最后却没能得到你想要的东西，那种一瞬间被失落灌满的样子让你感到不值得。

entry.title: 追光者*
entry.content:
人生是一次旅程，有上坡也有下坡。我不在乎自己的终点是坡顶还是谷底，只在乎沿路的风景美丽而富有生机！

entry.title: 不谓侠**
entry.content:
没有太晚的开始，不如就从今天行动。总有一天，那个一点一点可见的未来，会在你心里，也在你的脚下慢慢清透。生活，从不亏待每一个努力向上的人。

链接拿去，不喜勿喷！

https://kg.qq.com/node/play?s=MgegO-Md1zygSM7V&shareuid=649d958624283789&topsource=a0_pn201001004_z11_u60831502_l0_t1593085579__

entry.title: 起风了**
entry.content:
既然选择了追求，就不要哭泣。坚持一下，扛过今天，幸福就更近一步。真正能把人累垮的，是心里的绝望。

链接拿去，不喜勿喷！

https://kg.qq.com/node/play?s=9BHBPU9Linhln9lc&shareuid=649d958624283789&topsource=a0_pn201001004_z11_u60831502_l0_t1593085525__

entry.title: 英语演讲稿-常州地铁（高一下）****
entry.content:
​ Changzhou Metro is the urban rail transportation system serving Changzhou City, Jiangsu Province, China. Its first line was officially opened on September 21, 2019, becoming the fourth city in Jiangsu Province to open the metro. There are 6 cars in the whole metro, the top speed is 80 km / h, and the whole train has 264 seats. The top passenger capacity is 2062 people. Changzhou Metro is the need to promote the coordinated development of the regional economy and society in the Yangtze River Delta, and it meets the needs of the people to improve the quality of life.

​ The logo design “C, M” two letters looks like the tunnel graphics, “C, M” is the English abbreviation of Changzhou Metro, the entire logo very clearly reflects the characteristics of the metro. In addition, the logo graphics are also simplified patterns of Yancheng. Yancheng is a bright pearl in the history and culture of Changzhou, and it is also the oldest urban area preserved in China from the Western Zhou Dynasty to the Spring and Autumn Period. Its unique ancient city of three cities and three rivers has a history of nearly 3000 years.

​ The trains used on Changzhou Metro Line 1 are mainly red and black, and the front is matched with the “V” metal color, which reflects the theme of Changzhou “National Advanced City of Science and Technology”. In addition, the color and shape combine elements of Changzhou’s City Flower Chinese Rose, Changzhou’s City Tree Guangyulan and Dragon City Dragon Whiskers. The main color of the train car is light blue, and the overall interior lines are smooth. It has the atmosphere of the times.

​ There is one Changzhou Metro operating line, named Changzhou Metro Line 1, with a total mileage of about 34.2 kilometers and 29 stations.There is one line under construction in Changzhou Metro, named Changzhou Metro Line 2, with a total mileage of about 19.98 kilometers and 15 stations. In the future, there will be more metro lines.
entry.summary: ​ Changzhou Metro is the urban rail transportation system serving Changzhou City, Jiangsu Province, China. Its first line was offic

entry.title: 英语演讲稿-友谊（高一上）*
entry.content:
​ I think that friendship is the most beautiful thing in the world. It’s something as clear as crystal. It’s not a skill but a true feeling. If you have a good friend, you’ll feel the colourful life

​ Friendship is a kind of treasure in our lives. It is actually like a bottle of wine, the longer it is kept, the sweeter it will be. It is also like a cup of tea. When we are thirsty, it will be our best choice, but when we have enough time to enjoy ourselves, it is also the most fragrant drink.

​ When you’re down, friends lift you up. When you lose your way, friends guide you and cheer you on. Friendship is indispensable to people’s life. A man without friends is an angel without wings, whose life will suffer in the long tolerance of loneliness and depression. Friendship is the mother of our psyche, who’ll warm her kid when hurt occurs. We have much to share with our friends in life, perplexity, excitement, bitterness etc. It’s magnificent to maintain a genuine friendship.

​ How to make a friend. Understanding should come first. we should be good at observing and understanding the feelings and needs of our friends.Only when we get a better understanding of each other can we gain an authentic and meaningful friendship. We may find our hobbies of common interests. This feeling of affinity gets us closer and closer.

​ Everyone wants to be noticed and cared for by others.When a friend is depressed, don’t show off your pride. When a friend is successful, applaud him sincerely. In these ordinary, each other will be moved, the relationship will be more harmonious.

​ Tolerance is the third essential part in friendship. We are absolutely different persons. This individual distinction may cause conflict between us in every aspect of our life. Don’t immerse ourselves in this infliction too long. Try to tolerant his/her in an introspective mood. Saints are not perfect, let alone those ordinary people like us. Afterwards, we should get a good communication. Never shy to confess.

​ Finally, let’s pray together now that one day, all of us could find the person we want to find, and could enjoy a real beautiful friendship in our lives. Let’s pray the flower of friendship be-tween our friends and us would always bloom brightly in our hearts.Remember, friendship is your psyche’s guard, treasure it.
entry.summary: ​ I think that friendship is the most beautiful thing in the world. It’s something as clear as crystal. It’s not a skill but a true
